name: NY Threads Women's Flannel Shirt Plaid Shacket Fall Outfit Relaxed Fit Button Down Long Sleeve Top Casual Jacket for Women
product_description: Stay cozy and effortlessly stylish with the NY Threads Women's Flannel Shirt Jacket—a versatile layer that combines the ease of a flannel with the functionality of a jacket. This flannel shirt for women is designed for comfort and everyday wear, making it a go-to staple all year round. With its soft, brushed fabric, this women flannel shirt offers lightweight warmth without feeling heavy. The relaxed, loose fit allows for easy movement and is perfect for layering over your favorite t-shirts, sweatshirts, or tops. Whether you're heading out for errands, relaxing at home, or enjoying a casual weekend, this flannel shirt women trust will keep you comfortable and looking great. It can be worn buttoned up, open over layers, or even styled as a long flannel shirt women can wear with leggings or jeans. Designed with a timeless button-down front, this flannel shirt jacket women love offers a perfect balance of comfort, warmth, and casual style—making it a wardrobe essential.

The lightweight material offers both comfort and warmth, and can be worn alone or as a light jacket. The Oxford weave ensures durability, and it comes with a standard collar and button-down front.
